ch0296_10_nanjamo/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll jolt you good with some shockingly great
content!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7101_0701_01_10:
These sygna suit thingies are a special fit
made just for Pasio, right?
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7101_0701_02_10:
Neato! I’mma gather up some Trainers in
sygna suits for my next special feature!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7101_0701_03_10: Oh! You got the scheduling covered, right?!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7102_0701_01_10:
Raging Bolt is my super-duper electrifying
partner!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7102_0701_02_10:
If ya wanna get up close and personal, better be
careful, ’cause it’s intense and’ll zap ya with a
real KABOOM!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7102_0701_03_10:
It actually shorted my equipment the other
day with a direct ZAP of its lightning!
Oh noes!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7103_0701_01_10:
I wonder what my viewers think about my
videos on Pasio.
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7103_0701_02_10:
Lear even thanked me for the great PR!
Nyohoho!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7103_0701_03_10:
I’m gonna keep showin’ everybody all the
cool stuff from Pasio, so hit me up if you get
a scoop on some good content!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7104_0701_01_10:
One of my friendos is an Electric-type
Gym Leader just like me—and she’s also
totally famous!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7104_0701_02_10:
Her name’s Elesa, and we’ve got more in
common than I thought!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7104_0701_03_10:
Buuut...if both of us were on-screen at the
same time, viewers would start comparing,
and I’m pretty sure she’d outshine me.
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Wanna do a
little battlin’ for the live stream?
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7105_0701_02_10:
I ’unno what I’ll do if you turn me down!
It’d put me in a big ol’ pickle!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/7105_0701_03_10: Aw, c’mon! I want some fresh content!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, hey, friendo! I got this for a stream but
have a little extra. Here’s some for ya!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/1701_0702_01_10:
Wanna know what kind of stream it is?!
Guess you’ll just have to join as a guest
and find out!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2501_0701_01_10: Whaddya think of my sygna suit?
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2501_0701_02_10:
Now that I’ve got a couple different outfits,
I can change it up every time I stream!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2501_0701_03_10:
With this, my views will go up, up, up!
Nyahaha!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2501_0701_04_10:
Ah, man! I’m so jazzed, I’m on cloud
ninety-nine!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2501_0702_01_10: Which Iono style’s your fave, friendo?
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2501_0702_02_10:
Lemme know if there’s an outfit you like!
I’ll wear it for my next live stream!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2511_0701_01_10:
There’s one thing that’s super-duper
essential to making good streams!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2511_0701_02_10:
And that’s having dependable supporters
like you, friendo!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2511_0701_03_10:
Nyohoho! Thank ye muchly for always bein’
so helpful!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2511_0702_01_10:
I dunno if this works as a thank-you,
but I’mma keep featuring you in even
MORE of my streams!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/2511_0702_02_10:
Let’s dish out lotsa content and rake in those
sweet, sweet views together! Nyahaha!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh, you’re up already?! I was gonna prank you
awake on stream, but I guess I’m too late... Darn!
ch0296_10_nanjamo/3003_0701_01_10:
Think I might stumble on some new content if I go
for a walk? Or is that hoping for too much?
ch0296_10_nanjamo/3005_0701_01_10:
Tomorrow I’mma stick to you like glue and film
you all day! How’s that sound, huh? Huh?!
